name: Mutant Madness 2
description: Mutant Madness 2!!! The controls are simple, WASD or arrow keys, stuff like that. There will be a tutorial when you open the game and a controls menu incase you forget something. This game is more open world than Mutant Madness 1. It takes place in a made up world with all sorts of creatures and mutants. This is just the demo so only the field region is available (and because I haven't made the other regions yet). Hope you enjoy this demo!
